name: Just GO!
description:
Just GO! is a casual racing game in which the goal is to pass each level in the shortest amount of time possible. it is meant to be accessible for rookie players while also presenting a challenge for more experienced ones by requiring skills to have a good performance. 

You can choose 4 cars in 3 different levels, all with different ways to drive and interesting twists.

The best tip I can give is to not waste time and just GO!

If you have any feedback please do share it in the comment section!
